Text: Kudos for your awesome uploads. A question about this show. Will you encode the first few episodes in this format or make a series pack, now that the show is apparently over? Thanks for all your excelent work. :D
Also wanted to say thank you and inquire about the first half of the series.  I'd love to have them all in the same format.
Can u upload Fanboy and Chumchum Season 1 episodes please?
